name: Unity Invaders
description:
Unity Invaders

Developed by two Highschoolers, Unity Invaders features action rich gameplay combined with intricate game mechanics.
Customize your own ship, start up a round and get ready to fly through hell and beyond. The game is currently still
in development and players can look forward to an active, development and frequent updates.
Features:
- Highscore-system
- Multiple backgrounds
- Multiple ship skins
- Wave system
- Boss figths
